title: Authorizes disclosure of death of biological parents and adoptive children by adoption registry
summary: Authorizes the estate of either a natural parent or an adopted child to disclose the death of such person for inclusion in the health department's adoption information registry or an adoption agency's mutual consent voluntary adoption registry.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing disclosure of the death of biological parents and adoptive children by the adoption information registry and by the mutual consent voluntary adoption registry
